Name: Up/Down Control
Description1: This IPSO object is used to report the state of an up/down control element like a pair of push buttons or a rotary encoder. Counters for increase and decrease operations are provided for counting pulses from a quadrature encoder.

Name: Up Counter
Description: Counts the number of times the increase control has been operated. Writing a 0 resets the counter.

Name: Down Counter
Description: Counts the times the decrease control has been operated. Writing a 0 resets the counter.

Name: Application Type
Description: The application type of the sensor or actuator as a string depending on the use case.
